backend/main.mo: Main Land Canister implementing NFT land plot minting, token claiming with cooldowns, upgrade mechanics, loot caches, modifications system, and access control with authorized admin principal.
CANISTER_REINSTALL_GUIDE.md: Step-by-step guide for performing forced full reinstall of Land and Asset canisters on IC mainnet, including backup procedures and canister IDs for all five system canisters.
DEPLOYMENT_CHECKLIST.md: Pre-deployment checklist documenting required environment configuration in frontend/.env file for CyberGenesis deployment.
DEPLOYMENT_GUIDE.md: Comprehensive mainnet deployment guide covering prerequisites, deployment sequence for all five canisters, and 3D model asset setup.
DEPLOYMENT_INSTRUCTIONS.md: Critical environment configuration instructions and canister deployment order for the five-canister CyberGenesis system.
DEVELOPER_README.md: Complete developer documentation covering the multi-canister architecture (Land, Token, Marketplace, Governance, Asset), inter-canister communication, and project status as audit-ready.
ENVIRONMENT_CONFIGURATION.md: Guide documenting critical environment variables required in frontend/.env for network configuration and canister IDs.
ENVIRONMENT_SETUP.md: Setup guide for resolving Asset Canister configuration errors by properly deploying backend canisters and configuring environment variables for local and mainnet.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting four MapView.tsx improvements: inline styling for container, safe camera settings, debug UI overlay, and event capture for diagnostics.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Detailed summaries of all frontend components including MapView with debug overlay, Dashboard with conditional rendering, LandDashboard with reward mechanics, and 3D visualization components.
frontend/.env: Production environment configuration permanently set to IC mainnet with all five canister IDs, authorized admin principal, multi-gateway failover setup, and 120-second timeouts with 25-retry logic for maximum stability.
frontend/.env.example: Environment variable template with examples for local and mainnet configurations, including canister IDs, network settings, admin principal, and debug mode flags.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with cache-busting meta tags and root div for React application mount.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main application component that manages authentication flow, actor initialization, profile setup, and displays landing/dashboard pages with loading states and error handling.
frontend/src/asset-backend.d.ts: TypeScript type definitions for the asset backend canister interface, including Asset, UserProfile, UserRole types and all canister method signatures.
frontend/src/asset-backend.idl.ts: Candid IDL factory for the asset backend canister, defining the service interface with asset management, access control, and user profile functions.
frontend/src/backend.idl.ts: Candid IDL factory for the main backend canister, defining land management, token claiming, loot caches, modifiers, and HTTP transformation functions.
frontend/src/components/AdminGLBUpload.t: Admin component for uploading GLB 3D models to the asset canister with authorization checks, health validation, and progress tracking for valid land types.
frontend/src/components/AdminPanel.tsx: Collapsible admin panel for uploading GLB models with asset canister health checks, file validation, and upload progress tracking.
frontend/src/components/AssetCanisterDia: Diagnostic tool component that runs comprehensive tests on asset canister connectivity, authentication, queries, permissions, and inter-canister communication with detailed logging.
frontend/src/components/AssetCanisterRei: React component for reinitializing the Asset Canister with admin authorization checks, pre/post health checks, and a multi-step reinitialization process with status tracking.
frontend/src/components/CanisterDiagnost: Diagnostic tool that tests canister connectivity across multiple IC gateways, measures response times, and generates health reports with recommendations for Land and Asset canisters.
frontend/src/components/CanisterIDVerifi: UI component that verifies and displays the correctness of canister IDs (Land, Cyber Token, Asset, Marketplace, Governance) against expected values from environment variables.
Validation component that checks for required environment variables (canister IDs, network config) and displays critical errors or warnings in a prominent banner if configuration is invalid.
frontend/src/components/CosmicBackground: Animated 2D canvas background component that renders a cosmic scene with twinkling stars and pulsing nebulae using non-WebGL rendering for visual effects.
frontend/src/components/CubeVisualizatio: React Three Fiber component that renders a 3D scene with biome-specific GLTF models, custom FBM shader background sphere, bloom post-processing, and synchronized lighting that follows the camera.
frontend/src/components/CyberCube.tsx: Empty placeholder file; all 3D rendering logic has been moved to LandModel.tsx.
frontend/src/components/DeploymentVerifi: Health monitoring dashboard that checks LandCanister and AssetCanister status, displays operational state with icons, and provides manual refresh functionality with query invalidation.
frontend/src/components/Discovery.tsx: UI for discovering and processing loot caches with tiered costs (CBR tokens and charge), displays cache inventory, and handles cache processing to obtain modifiers.
frontend/src/components/ErrorBoundary.ts: React error boundary component that catches component errors and displays a styled error notification with AlertTriangle icon and error message.
frontend/src/components/Governance.tsx: Governance interface for staking CBR tokens, creating proposals with title/description, and voting on active proposals with weighted voting based on staked balance.
frontend/src/components/LandDashboard.ts: Main land management dashboard showing selected land details, token balance, cooldown timers for reward claims, upgrade functionality, and modifier application with admin debug features.
File appears to be empty or contains only whitespace.
frontend/src/components/LandModel.tsx: React component that loads and renders 3D GLTF land models with KTX2 texture support, applies biome-specific lighting and emissive effects, and handles camera fitting and animation.
frontend/src/components/LandSelector.tsx: UI component for navigating between multiple land plots with previous/next buttons, displaying land name, biome type in Russian, and current position in the collection.
frontend/src/components/Leaderboard.tsx: Displays a top-10 ranking of lands by token balance with special styling for top 3 positions, showing plot name, upgrade level, and CBR token balance.
frontend/src/components/MapView.tsx: Interactive map component using Maptalks.js CDN library to display all lands with biome-colored markers, user land highlighting, and click-to-view functionality.
frontend/src/components/Marketplace.tsx: Marketplace UI for buying, selling, and listing lands and modifiers with filtering by type and price, showing active listings and user's own items with cancel functionality.
frontend/src/components/NetworkDiagnosti: Network health monitoring component that performs periodic health checks against the Asset Canister, displays connection status, latency metrics, and uptime with expandable details.
frontend/src/components/ParticleBackgrou: React component that renders an animated particle background using 2D Canvas API with moving particles, connecting lines, and glow effects.
frontend/src/components/PlotCustomizatio: UI component for customizing land plot properties including name (max 20 chars) and decoration URL, using React Query mutations to update backend.
frontend/src/components/PlugWalletButton: Wallet connection button component with dropdown menu showing principal ID, copy functionality, and disconnect option when connected.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetup.tsx: Profile creation form component that prompts new users to enter their name and saves it via mutation hook.
frontend/src/components/Reinitialization: Full-screen overlay component displaying connection retry progress with attempt counter, current gateway info, and animated progress bar.
frontend/src/components/ThreeErrorBounda: React Error Boundary class component that catches 3D rendering errors, displays fallback UI, and prevents Canvas crashes with retry functionality.
frontend/src/config/mainnet.ts: Mainnet configuration file defining ICP canister IDs, asset URLs, model filenames by tier, wallet settings, feature flags, and helper functions for validation and URL generation.
React context provider for Plug Wallet integration, managing connection state, principal authentication, and actor creation for Internet Computer canisters.
frontend/src/data/modifierCatalog.ts: Static catalog of 45+ placeholder game modifiers organized by rarity tiers (1-4), each with id, name, rarity, and asset URL properties.
frontend/src/governance-backend.d.ts: TypeScript type definitions for governance backend interface including proposals, voting, staking operations, and their result types.
frontend/src/governance-backend.idl.ts: Candid IDL factory definition for governance backend service, specifying all method signatures and data structures for Internet Computer canister communication.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and manages backend actor instances with Internet Identity authentication, automatically invalidating dependent queries on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useActorReinitializer: Hook providing automatic actor reinitialization with gateway rotation across multiple IC endpoints, implementing retry logic with progressive delays up to 3 attempts.
frontend/src/hooks/useActorWithInit.ts: Hook that wraps useActor with initialization polling logic, validating backend connectivity through multiple query tests with progressive backoff (up to 25 attempts over 120 seconds).
frontend/src/hooks/useAssetActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated actor for the Asset Canister with automatic gateway failover (ic0.app, boundary.ic0.app, icp-api.io), health checks, retry logic (25 attempts with exponential backoff), and environment validation. Integrates with Internet Identity for authentication.
frontend/src/hooks/useAssetHealth.ts: React hook that monitors Asset Canister health status by polling the /health endpoint with a 1-second delay and 3-second timeout, returning 'checking', 'healthy', or 'error' status.
frontend/src/hooks/useAssetUpload.ts: React hook for uploading GLB files to the Asset Canister using Plug wallet authentication, converting files to byte arrays and calling the uploadLandModel method with progress tracking and error handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useGovernanceActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated actor for the Governance Canister with automatic gateway failover, 120-second timeout, 25 retry attempts with exponential backoff, and Internet Identity integration.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React context provider and hook for Internet Identity authentication, managing login/logout state, identity persistence in local storage, delegation validation, and configurable AuthClient options with idle handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useMarketplaceActor.t: Creates and manages an authenticated actor for the Marketplace Canister with automatic gateway failover (ic0.app primary), 120-second timeout, 25 retry attempts with exponential backoff, and Internet Identity integration.
Provides React Query hooks for Plug Wallet transactions across token, marketplace, and governance canisters, including buying/listing items, staking tokens, and voting on proposals with automatic query invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for land data, user profiles, token balances, and placeholder types for governance proposals and marketplace listings with comprehensive error handling and retry logic.
frontend/src/hooks/useTokenActor.ts: Creates and manages the token canister actor with automatic gateway failover across multiple IC endpoints, 120-second timeout, and 25-retry initialization logic using Internet Identity authentication.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind CSS configuration with cyberpunk-themed dark mode colors, Orbitron/JetBrains Mono fonts, glassmorphism effects, and neon glow utilities for cyan, green, purple, and yellow accents.
frontend/src/lib/buildInfo.ts: Exports build timestamp and version information for cache busting, providing utilities to append version query parameters to URLs and log deployment metadata on app initialization.
frontend/src/lib/debugConfig.ts: Provides debug logging utilities for 3D scene components with GPU context diagnostics, renderer detection, and scene stability testing, activated via environment variables or query parameters.
frontend/src/lib/modelLoader.ts: File content truncated; likely contains 3D model loading utilities for Three.js/R3F components based on project context.
frontend/src/lib/tokenUtils.ts: Utility functions for ICRC-1 token handling with 8 decimal places, including formatting balances to human-readable strings, parsing decimal amounts to base units (bigint), adding thousands separators, and checking sufficient balance for transactions.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that renders the root React component with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider wrappers.
frontend/src/marketplace-backend.d.ts: TypeScript type definitions for the marketplace backend canister, including Listing interface, ItemType enum (Land/Modifier), BuyResult variant type, and marketplace interface methods for listing, buying, and querying items.
frontend/src/marketplace-backend.idl.ts: Candid IDL factory definition for the marketplace backend service, defining the interface types and methods that match the TypeScript declarations.
frontend/src/pages/Collection.tsx: Collection page component that displays the complete catalog of modifiers from PLANNED_MODIFIER_CATALOG, organized by rarity tiers (Common, Rare, Legendary, Mythic) with tier-specific styling and glow effects.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Main dashboard component with tab navigation (Land, Discovery, Collection, Leaderboard, Marketplace, Governance, Map) that fetches and displays user's land data with land selection support for multiple parcels.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Landing page with cosmic/particle backgrounds that prompts users to connect via Internet Identity, displaying login status and error handling.
frontend/src/pages/MintingPage.tsx: Minting page that shows loading state while initializing land data and actor, then displays success message before redirecting to dashboard.
frontend/src/pages/VerificationPage.tsx: Verification page that displays CanisterIDVerification component to check canister configuration correctness with cosmic background styling.
frontend/src/token-backend.d.ts: TypeScript type definitions for the ICRC-1 token backend canister, including Account, TransferArgs, TransferError/Result types, and token interface methods for balance queries, transfers, minting, and access control.
frontend/src/token-backend.idl.ts: Candid IDL factory defining the ICRC-1 token interface with types for Account, TransferArgs, TransferError, and service methods including balance_of, transfer, metadata, total_supply, and mint.
frontend/src/types/webgpu.d.ts: TypeScript type declarations for the WebGPU API, defining interfaces for GPU, GPUAdapter, GPUDevice, GPULimits, and related types to enable WebGPU feature detection without compilation errors.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for extracting, storing, and managing URL parameters and sessionStorage values, supporting both standard query strings and hash-based routing with persistence across navigation.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom color scheme using OKLCH color space, extended border radius, neon box shadows, and accordion animations for a themed UI design system.
frontend/vite.config.ts: Vite configuration for React app with environment variable injection, build timestamp for cache busting, proxy setup for local API, CORS headers for SharedArrayBuffer support, and optimized chunking for React and Three.js vendors.
project_state.json: Project state tracking document for a game map feature using Maptalks.js, documenting debugging efforts for a black screen issue on tablets with on-screen debug UI and inline CSS fixes.
README_RUSSIAN.md: Russian-language quick start guide covering installation requirements, dependencies, and deployment steps for CyberGenesis.
scripts/upload_assets_mainnet.sh: Mainnet deployment script that uploads all GLB model files from assets/models to the AssetCanister on ICP mainnet with rate limiting, base64 encoding, and upload verification.
scripts/upload_assets.sh: Bash script to batch upload 48 tier-based 3D model GLB files (12 per tier across 4 tiers) to the AssetCanister on local dfx, with verification and URL generation.
